DESCRIPTION: Increase damage and #yBlock of a card by X until that card is played.
Brittle cards #yExhaust when they are #yEmpowered above X and lose all #yEmpower.
Ephemeral cards #yExhaust when played and are #yEthereal.
Deal damage displayed and heal equal to unblocked damage dealt.
Put a number of cards from your discard pile to your hand.
Choose #b1 of #b3 cards to add to your hand.
Triggers if the card is played first in the turn
Triggers at the end of the turn if the card was played last.
